description: Configuration file for Linux Broker VM deployments

_comments.avd.deploy: Set to false to skip AVD deployment
_comments.avd.resourceGroup: Resource group where AVD resources will be deployed (will be created if it doesn't exist)
_comments.linuxVMs.deploy: Set to false to skip Linux VM deployment
_comments.linuxVMs.resourceGroup: Resource group where Linux VMs will be deployed (will be created if it doesn't exist)
_comments.vmSizes: Use Azure VM sizes like 'Standard_D2s_v3', 'Standard_DS2_v2', etc.
_comments.network: Must specify existing VNet, subnet, and resource group for VM deployments
_comments.passwords: Use strong passwords - consider using Azure Key Vault references
